creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: white shirt with black, yellow, green, and red geometric embroidery; embroidered designs located at sleeve cuffs, collar, and at shirt's chest; neck collar is circular and has two buttoned opening in front; shirt is machine stitched; long red and black tassel at collar; embroidered on back near hem in green: eight sided geometric figure with six sided geometric figure below
title: Shirt
